name: Adventure The Four Swords
description:
Explore the ruins of an ancient civilization in a world long forgotten
• Explore the secrets of other worlds, face deadly challenges, face powerful monsters, as you discover the legend of an evil leader
• Fight against the threatening enemies of the earth, overcome dangerous obstacles and escape from deadly traps
• Fight the bad guys with a variety of powerful and different swords
If you want to fight evil, to become a new Batman and start to independently administer justice to killers, as the assassins did, then hurry up to download this unique ADVENTURE : The Four Swords game in which you need to fight monsters, and other villains using all the knowledge, skills and experiences you have! Every player plunges into the lively realistic atmosphere, Do you want to become a hero and improve your leadership skills?
So download the game now and enjoy

Story

in ancient times the lord of evil opened four doors of other worlds in our world.

the monsters started coming out of those doors and destroy everything they see.

After many attempts by humans to reclaim their land, they did not succeed.

Until a person appeared  called the Guardian of Earth carrying four strong swords. 

He began to eliminate those monsters one by one until he reached to leader of evil.

The fight started between them after which the leader of evil was defeated.

and before the Guardian of Earth killed the Leader of Evil, some witches smuggled him and he disappeared.

So far, we haven't heard nothing about him.
